   Larry Pratt
   stated on May 6, 2014 in an interview on 'All in with Chris Hayes':
   "20 percent of the time (smart guns) won't work."

true false
     * Technology
     * PunditFact
     * Guns
     * Larry Pratt
   Katie Sanders
   By Katie Sanders May 20, 2014

Gun advocate Larry Pratt says 'smart guns' fail 20 percent of the time

   The debate over "smart guns" doesn’t always turn up accurate talking
   points.

Pratt questions the guns’ reliability, saying smart guns
   are "only 80 percent effective."

Our ruling

   Pratt said "20 percent of the time (smart guns) won't work," which he got
   from a 2003 magazine story referencing unpublished research from the  New
   Jersey Institute of Technology.
